title: Maintenance works on the Punggol LRT system

title_translations.zh-Hans: 榜鹅轻轨系统维修工程
title_translations.ms: Kerja penyelenggaraan di sistem LRT Punggol

updates.text: We will be conducting maintenance works on the Punggol LRT system this Sunday, 23 Aug 2020. Train service will operate as usual on one platform while the other will be closed for works. Service on both platforms will commence as usual on Monday, 24 Aug.
